title: Will using Wooxy for custom skins punishable? (If yes what is the Punishment)
body:
I have been wanting to try and use a lot of different custom skins but the fear of loosing my acoount that i have for almost 3 Years has stopped me from doing so.
I want to know for sure the outcome if i decide to use custom skins
Thank you.

replies.body: We're not currently banning for this, but that can change at anytime.  You're also putting yourself at risk by using third party programs, you can never be too sure if there's malicious content hiding in those files.  We also wouldn't be able to offer support if you ran into any issues.  Check out our[ third party](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) guide, and be wary!
